|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;A20; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 (v7-A) |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = MicroSD Card |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Apacer;; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53125; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), Mini PCIe, microSD card slot, Micro SIM Card slot |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = PoE in, buzzer, 4G LTE, microSD card slot, Micro SIM Card slot |addchip = PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP209;;1;,,, 802.3at PD w/ Synchronous Flyback Controller;Linear Technology;LTC4278;;1;,,, Silicon Rectifier Bridge;Huajing Microelectronics;R6S08;;2;,,, 40V 100A Single N-Channel Trench MOSFET;MagnaChip;MDU1722;;1;,,, 100V 43A N-Channel Enhancement Mode MOSFET;SinoPower;SM1A64NHKP;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6354 |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (half) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4354; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Ublox TOBY-L201 |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1cpu = <!-- true, --> |rad2chip1 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad2chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad2chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2stand = LTE
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Barracuda", "BNMB051/SC2 MB" and "PEW1-A20SC2-VOC" :are silkscreened on bottom of board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] A20 @1.0GHz Dual-core ARM (Cortex-A7) *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Storage: 16GB microSD Card *PCI: 2x PCIe slots *Network: 4x Gigabit Ethernet ports *WiFi: [[Broadcom]] BCM4354 (802.11abgn+ac) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 and 1 USB OTG ports *Power: 12V, 3A via 2-pin Molex or 802.3at via WAN port
==Links of Interest== :[https://campus.barracuda.com/product/cloudgenfirewall/doc/73723071/sc2/ Product information]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Barracuda Secure Connector SC29 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Barracuda Secure Connector SC29 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:Barracuda Secure Connector SC29 PoE Top.jpeg|PoE Board Top File:Barracuda Secure Connector SC29 PoE Bottom.jpeg|PoE Board Bottom File:Barracuda Secure Connector SC29 Internal.jpeg|Internal View </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
